metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16688 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Dolibarr 9.0.5 has stored XSS in an Email Template section to mails_templates.php. A user with no privileges can inject script to attack the admin. (This stored XSS can affect all types of user privilege from Admin to users with no permissions.)

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
